name: Dublet
description: Dublet is a unique puzzle game inspired by jigsaw puzzles where you must fill in the beautifully hand crafted boards based on the rules of the pieces given. There are five types of pieces each with its own rules about placement. There are 36 puzzles in all. Each building on the difficulty of the previous. Each piece has a set of six puzzles design to show off its rules. The final six puzzles use all five pieces and are the hardest to solve. Each piece comes in a variety of colors and faces, the border color and shape uniquely identifies the rules of the piece.
